extendedInfo.description: *The Original Word Mix â¢**NEW*Replenish your items in the item store.New accounts and leaderboardsItems and scores can move with you to a new deviceAd supported.Full featured.Word Mix â¢ is an addictive anagram game where you need to form as many words possible out of a pile of six jumbled letters. Be sure to guess the six letter word to move to the next level. Guess as many words as you can to add to your score...you too could top the global leaderboard! Compete against the clock or play a leisurely untimed game. With two English dictionaries and three foreign dictionaries, tens of thousands of levels await you!FeaturesWith an account your scores and items are portableExperimental foreign language dictionaries (Spanish, French, Italian)!!Compare your score with others with the global leaderboards!5 dictionaries.Keyboard supportHints are available.Timed and untimed games!Definition lookup thanks to Merriam-Webster12000+ English levels15000+ Italian levels15000+ French levels10000+ Spanish levelsHint: To change your dictionary, from the main menu press "Menu"->"Settings"->"Dictionary"

reviews.title: what the hell (update)
reviews.comment: *Comment Update- After installing the Update, it was working fine... for a few days, its back to REMOVING A LETTER so you cant spell the main word(s)! So instead of just telling me Ive failed the level, by default by removing a letter, I fail... its just a round bubble without a letter...Very frustrating!....sg3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addicted App
reviews.comment: Alwz have a Gr8 fun while using the app...:-) Gud work
reviews.author: VINEET KUMAR VIMAL

reviews.title: Game is great except.
reviews.comment: The game structure is great. The time is too short on the timed games. The dictionary omits many common words and stretches a bit for others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Anagram Game
reviews.comment: Love this game! It\'s a great time filler. Challenging, smart, everything you want in a game. Addicting. Good job.
reviews.author: Karen Malinosky

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Nice game, learn how to find the word!!!
reviews.author: Rudi Efendi

reviews.title: Help...Next button disappeared
reviews.comment: In the puzzle game after completing all words with the letters EARWAX, there is no Next button on the screen. The only option appears to be End the game, but I don\'t want to loose 14,400,000 points. The update didn\'t solve the problem...Any help?
reviews.author: Silvi Dion

reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Michellini San Juan

reviews.comment: Fun
reviews.author: Allison Alexander

reviews.title: Dig it
reviews.comment: Life\'s a garden.
reviews.author: courtney lazalier

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Mario Petronio

reviews.comment: For some reason, you pass a level and it reverts back to the main menu and then you hit resume and it says you have failed the level and all words are in red. I am uninstalling this game. It\'s sad, was my favorite game.
reviews.author: Kristi Farmer

reviews.title: Horrible Since Upgrade!
reviews.comment: I have had this application for years and loved it. However, since the last upgrade it crashes my phone, freezes during the game which causes me to lose the game because I can\'t use my keyboard! This game has gone from at least a 4 to a ZERO! Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Kynette Campbell

reviews.title: Upgrade crashes
reviews.comment: Have just upgraded and it now crashes continously.  What did you do? Please fix.  Too late to take note of your do not up grade notice!
reviews.author: Regine Cope

reviews.title: This is by far my favorite time-killer app.
reviews.comment: Great for those interminable waits at the dentist\'s office. I hope you can get the recent crash issues resolved. It always occurs right after a new banner ad appears. Some of these ads do some crazy stuff. I suspect some of them are overtaxing the graphics subsystem or the CPU itself.
reviews.author: Paul Edgecomb

reviews.title: Ruined it!!
reviews.comment: What did you do to the app? It keeps reverting to the home screen automatically in the middle of the game and resuming it ends the game instead of resuming it. This update has introduced more bugs rather than removing them. I have Android 4.2.2 on HTC One.
reviews.author: Alpa Bhargava

reviews.title: Was a great game!
reviews.comment: I used to play this game all of the time but now it is a complete waste of time playing due to it constantly freezing even after latest update. Please fix I would have giving 5 stars if worked as it should.
reviews.author: Alan Ludley

reviews.comment: So sad that this great game has been destroyed by the update. You should warn people not to upgrade before they do it..and why aren\'t all users allowed the new upgrade ?
reviews.author: Beaver B

reviews.title: Locks up
reviews.comment: I use to play this on my other phone but now since it\'s been updated all it keeps doing is freezing and then goes back to the main screen. This was my favorite game but now I dont know.  I hope you can fix this issue please. :)
reviews.author: Melissa Goss

reviews.title: Word mix lite
reviews.comment: Hi since the update the game keeps closing. I love this game, would give a 5 but it has spoiled my enjoyment of the game. Plz fix. Thanx
reviews.author: jax hall

reviews.comment: I love this game, but the latest update really screwed it up. It crashes constantly and ends the game every time. No bueno.
reviews.author: A Google User
